name: Solitaire Master 2
description:
Solitaire Master 2 is a collection of most popular solitaire games, including ones known to everyone, such as Klondike, Spider and FreeCell, as well as others, such as Yukon and Scorpion, including different versions of each.

Each of the games includes its rules and counts statistics for the player.

Full list of solitaires below:

Klondike 1-cardKlondike 3-cardKingsleySpiderSpider 2-colorsMrs. Mop
ScorpionScorpion IIWaspYukonDouble YukonAlaskaForty and EightForty ThievesForty BanditsCanfieldDemonSuperior CanfieldFreeCellSea TowersSeven By FourBlockadeBusy AcesDeucesBisley
